paragraph_1.title: The Tastiest Delivery in Zaporizhzhia
paragraph_1.text_1: Love delicious food but don’t want to spend time cooking? Then it’s the perfect moment to order sushi in Zaporizhzhia from BEST WOK. We know how to make your evening pleasant, your lunch satisfying, and your festive table stylish and modern. Hundreds of our customers confirm every day that quality sushi delivery in the city is simple, fast, and affordable.

paragraph_2.title: Fast Sushi Delivery in Zaporizhzhia by BEST WOK
paragraph_2.text_1: Sometimes you crave fresh rolls or sets but don’t want to wait long. That’s why BEST WOK ensures that delivery works quickly and conveniently for you. Just a few clicks on the website — and your order is already being prepared. Our chefs get to work immediately so that you receive your dishes warm, fresh, and appetizing. We deliver sushi in Zaporizhzhia every day, without days off, from morning until late evening. Our couriers know the city well, so even during rush hours your food arrives fast. If you want to order sushi for a specific time, just place your order in advance — we’ll adjust the delivery to fit your schedule.

paragraph_3.title: Order Sushi with Delivery: Why Choose BEST WOK
paragraph_3.text_1: There are plenty of reasons why the people of Zaporizhzhia prefer us. BEST WOK is not just delivery — it’s a whole philosophy of freshness and convenience. Here are our main advantages:
paragraph_3.text_2: Fresh ingredients. Salmon, shrimp, tuna, avocado, and other products come only from trusted suppliers.
paragraph_3.text_3: Professional sushi chefs. Every dish is prepared by masters who follow Japanese traditions while adding their own signature touch.
paragraph_3.text_4: Speed and care. Our couriers work fast and carefully — your dishes will arrive fresh and beautifully packed. Convenient ordering options.
paragraph_3.text_5: You can place an order online via the website, in the mobile app, or by phone.
paragraph_3.text_6: Payment options: by card, cash, or terminal upon delivery.
paragraph_3.text_7: New arrivals. Our menu is regularly updated with new sets and rolls to surprise even our regular customers.
paragraph_3.text_8: Delicious sushi with fast delivery: a wide variety of dishes.

paragraph_4.title: Order Sushi to Your Home in Zaporizhzhia – Fast Citywide Delivery from BEST WOK
paragraph_4.text_1: No matter where you live — in the city center or the suburbs — BEST WOK has organized logistics so that delivery works equally fast in all districts of Zaporizhzhia. We carefully pack sushi to ensure it maintains its appearance and taste during transportation. We also offer free delivery — just place an order that meets the minimum amount for your area. You can find all the details on our website in the 'Delivery' section. Want to surprise your guests or treat yourself to your favorite rolls? Then order sushi to your home from BEST WOK — and you’ll get not only delicious food but also top-quality service.

delivery_terms_page.title: Payment and Delivery
delivery_terms_page.min_order_price: Minimum order amount for different zones
delivery_terms_page.subtitle_1: Delivery is free for orders that meet the minimum amount specified for each zone
delivery_terms_page.subtitle_2: You can pay for your order:
delivery_terms_page.pickup_text_1: — select “pickup” when placing an order and get a 10%* discount on the entire menu
delivery_terms_page.pickup_text_2: — receive your order at a convenient time (orders must be placed at least 40 minutes in advance)

motto._2: these are the three principles behind the “BEST WOK” delivery service

benefits._1: Try it yourself and see — sushi, rolls, pizza, soups, and salads are prepared by the best chefs in Dnipro. We use only fresh and high-quality ingredients in the cooking process.
benefits._2: All dishes you order are prepared right before dispatch. To preserve their taste and aroma, we use special food packaging.
benefits._3: Ordering sushi from Rock-n-Roll is easy and convenient. Just give us a call or place your order online. And free delivery straight to your door will save you both time and money.

about_numbers.title: BEST WOK Delivery in Numbers
about_numbers.description: Our mission is to provide our customers with high-quality and delicious dishes from Japanese, Chinese, and Italian cuisines, offering a wide selection — from sushi and pizza to wok and salads — showcasing the creativity of our brand chef!
about_numbers._1: years we’ve been serving you! Tens of thousands of satisfied customers and a high level of trust.
about_numbers._2: employees in our friendly team who work diligently, putting all their experience and heart into what they do.
about_numbers._3: delicious orders completed over the years! We fulfill every order perfectly — because it’s a gift of happiness to our guests!
about_numbers._4: average delivery time — we cook and deliver your favorite dishes faster than you can get hungry!

gifts.title: Gifts

description._1: We give gifts for orders placed through our food delivery service! To receive a gift, you need to order sushi, rolls, sets, salads, pizza, or any other dishes from our menu.

gifts.notice: Attention! The gift cannot be combined with other gifts, birthday discounts, promo codes, or scratch cards. The gift can be combined with self-pickup discounts and active promotions.

birthday.title: 10% Birthday Discount!

description._1: You can use the discount on your birthday and within 5 days after your birthday.
description._2: To receive the discount, you need to:
description._3: The discount applies to all dishes on the BEST WOK delivery menu.

birthday.instructions: When placing an order, be sure to mention in the comments or to the operator during confirmation that it’s your birthday. Show your passport to the courier or our administrators when picking up the order yourself.
birthday.notice: The discount cannot be combined with other discounts, promotions, or gifts.

certificates.title: Gift Certificates for 500 or 1000 UAH
certificates.description: BEST WOK Certificates: the certificate holder receives a secret code that activates a deposit amount specified on the physical certificate, which can be used for any dish from the online restaurant menu "BEST WOK". If the total cost of selected items is less than the deposit, the remaining balance is not refundable and will be forfeited. The certificate can only be used once. When exchanging the certificate for products, the recipient must hand over the physical certificate to an authorized company representative (administrator or courier). When placing an order, the client must provide the unique certificate number. The validity period of the certificate is indicated on the back of the card.
